faqs.a: Hi! I'm Vardhan, a Full Stack Developer and AEM Specialist with 5+ years of experience. I specialize in React, TypeScript, AEM, Node.js, and AWS. I'm passionate about creating high-performing digital experiences and mentoring teams.
I am a Full Stack Developer and AEM Specialist with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. I specialize in React, TypeScript, AEM, Node.js, and AWS.
My key skills include React, TypeScript, Next.js, Adobe Experience Manager, Node.js, Java Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, AWS, Docker, and Three.js.

faqs.q: What are your top technical skills
faqs.a: My top technical skills are: React & TypeScript for frontend development, Adobe Experience Manager for CMS solutions, Node.js & Java Spring Boot for backend services, AWS for cloud infrastructure, and PostgreSQL for database management. I also work with modern tools like Docker, Next.js, and Three.js for 3D experiences.

faqs.q: Tell me about your experience with React
faqs.a: I have extensive experience with React, having used it in multiple projects including React UIs integrated with AEM at Freddie Mac, AEM backed portals at University of Cincinnati, and various personal projects. I work with React hooks, context API, and modern patterns for building scalable applications.

faqs.q: What projects have you worked on recently
faqs.a: Recent projects include: a Telemetry page at T Mobile with dynamic binding and reusable components, React UIs integrated with AEM at Freddie Mac for modular content delivery, and AEM backed portals with React at University of Cincinnati using Content Fragments.
You can contact me at vardhana1209@gmail.com or call 5135486916. I'm located in Cincinnati, Ohio.

I have a Master of Science in Information Technology from University of Cincinnati with a perfect GPA of 4.0 (completed Dec 2023), and a Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology from JNTU Hyderabad (completed 2013).

faqs.q: Do you have experience with cloud platforms
faqs.a: Yes, I have extensive experience with AWS including EC2, Lambda, S3, and containerization with Docker. I've deployed applications on AWS infrastructure, set up CI/CD pipelines, and implemented serverless architectures for scalable solutions.

I aim to leverage my full stack and AEM expertise to deliver high-performing digital experiences, mentor teams, and grow into leadership roles that drive innovation with AI, cloud, and enterprise-scale systems.

faqs.q: Tell me about your leadership experience
faqs.a: I have leadership experience as an AEM Full Stack Developer and Dev Lead at T Mobile, where I lead delivery by writing authoring guides, coordinating deployments across environments, mentoring teammates, and driving secure coding and testing practices.

faqs.q: What technologies do you work with
faqs.a: I work with a comprehensive tech stack including: Frontend (React, TypeScript, Next.js, Three.js), Backend (Node.js, Java Spring Boot, REST APIs, GraphQL), CMS (Adobe Experience Manager), Database (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB), Cloud (AWS, Docker), and Tools (Git, Jest, Postman).

I have 5+ years of experience as a full stack developer with 3+ years specializing in Adobe Experience Manager. My career includes roles at T Mobile (current), Freddie Mac, University of Cincinnati, Tata Consultancy Services, and Arisglobal, where I've built scalable web applications and led development teams.

My strengths include rapid prototyping, pixel-perfect UI/UX implementation, performance tuning and optimization, cross-functional collaboration, system thinking, and authoring comprehensive guides and documentation.
I am located in Cincinnati, Ohio.
